metadata.name: DIVINE
metadata.description:
Mind me touching the hem of your garment?
Mind me feeling the rhythm you feel?
Mind me syncing to the soft touch of the atmosphere around you?
Mind me sharing from your full embodiment?
You are divine, you carry light
You are divine you speak power
Every droplet of your virtue is crystal 
Every of your step is evergreen 
Everything you touch becomes new 
You are divine 
You command peace
You are divine 
Your smell heals
You are divine 
Don’t vanish
I’m wandering around your vineyard cos I want to feel that you are Divine
